column4: Pilots strike at cargo airline serving Amazon  DHL as holidays near

column4: Kirkland Lake shareholders vote in favor of Newmarket takeover-sources

column4: Senate panel postpones Mylan hearing
column5: WASHINGTON The U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee on Monday postponed a hearing planned for next week to discuss Mylan NV's  pending $465 million settlement to resolve charges that it underpaid government healthcare programs by misclassifying its EpiPen emergency allergy treatment.
